idea: Solving the pain point of Indian Busy Dads.
name: STEALTH MODE

idea:
Mintifi is India's one of the first online lending platforms committed towards the growth of small and medium businesses, across sectors.
Today, it is very difficult for most small businesses to get fund from large financial corporations. Our thorough analysis and digital ecosystem helps you solve all your fund problems, that too in the simplest yet fastest way possible. We believe India has immense opportunity and talent, but lacks the right resources at the right time.
Our aim is to fund each SME in the country, to eventually support our country be a global super power across industries.
name: MINTIFI PRIVATE LIMITED

name: BLINC Technologies

idea:
Dear Sir,


Our idea is to promote the more than successful campaign of our honorable PM Shri Narendra Modi of LPG distribution and making gas stoves reach to every household possible.


Today with the trends of cooktops coming with a glasstop a huge amount of foreign exchange is being lost by the country due to imports of these glasses entirely from China. 


We as a company have invested in manufacturing these glasses now in India and are proud to be the only company in India to have this facility for cooktop glasses exclusively. 


Also we address the highly needed safety measures for use of cooktops as we have made a survey and realize since this product is the need for every kitchen/ house, basic safety measures as missed out and also due to lack of knowledge in the correct usability. Also we discovered that the cooking member of the family is very occupied with taking care of the entire needs of the family and it is a common practice where the the individual leaves the knob open/gas leakage problems which leads to explosion. We would like to address this problems with our flame safety devices installed in every cooktop.


Our project also includes in promoting the highly successful campaign of #giveitup launched by the Honb'le PM and make it reach to maximum houses that can afford this and also encourage the middle income groups to give up their subsidies on LPG cylinders through our marketing plan in the way of the same amount (as their LPG subsidy per year) to reach to the customer by the way of intensives hence having an almost zero effect of the customer when they give up their subsidy but in turn the government can use that amount for further development.


We also have designed a service method and with the help of technology offer genuine and very reasonable service to the customers for their any brand gas stoves. This shall ensure the customer is very confident that he is not being cheated and doesnt have spend a big some just under the influence of local service agencies who normally cheat the customer by scaring them due to the safety aspect of the cooktop to make extra money.


The customer can have an assurity of genuine spare parts, nominal costs and a complete guarantee and piece of mind. With real time tracking features of the technician, background check, and fully transparent and economical costs. We would like to create an service experience for the smallest of households with full confidence as Uber cabs has done this with the Travel segment in India.


By qualification we are experts in gas stove manufacturing and would now like to take this one step forward.


Our project revolves around the following :

1) Huge foreign exchange savings by the government and reduce dependency on imports.

2) Making gas stoves reach maximum to maximum no. of households.

3) Making the Honb'le PM's campaign #GiveItUp the next level and a huge huge success - In turn saving extensively the government money on subsidies given.

4) Offer safety measures to every household

5) Offer the most genuine product as the best prices

6) Giving a service experience for a cooktop like no others.


All an all a project that takes care of the entire cooktop needs of the customer in coordination with the government to make its vision of LPG cooking and subsidies and foreign exchange savings to be a huge huge hit.


We have already applied to the MakeInIndia program and do have approvals from them, We have also given a presentation to the startup India, SIDBI, and now we are really looking for a DIPP approval. 


We are a young team with very fresh ideas, A pure intention to grow the gas stove market as we have worked only in the gas stoves field and have a win win situation for the government, the customers and we as organisation.


We eagerly look forward to hearing form you and we thank you for having this platform where we can now reach out to you.


A very big thank you.


Regards,

Udhav Murarka
name: sangeeta appliances llp

idea:
V Kwality Co. is into the manufacturing of Environmental Recycling Systems (ERS) which is a fully automatic Organic Waste Converter. A decentralized technology developed for reducing the organic waste produced around us and to convert it into high quality compost.

We thrive on challenges and excel in developing and implementing energy saving solutions in the market through complete research. With complete transparency in work and values, we wish to build a strong relationship with our customers and suppliers.

Our mission is to be a leading solid waste management organization that provides safe, economically sustainable, environmentally sound services by utilizing new collection methods and technologies for greater cost effectiveness.
name: V Kwality Company

idea:
Our Services and Solutions:
• Engineering Design and Development
• Industrial Design, Product Design and Development

   (Static, Dynamic, Optimization, Durability, Shock, Thermal and CFD)
• CNC, Conventional and Additive Manufacturing Solutions
• Robotics & Automation
• Quality and Inspection Services (3D Scanners, CMM, Optical Measuring Machine, Industrial CT and X Ray Solutions)
• Technical Documentation, Process Design
• HR Sourcing
